mapper.select: SELECT a.ORDER_ID AS id, b.SELECT_VALUE AS type, a.CREATE_TIME AS time, CASE WHEN a.ORDER_STATUS = '01' THEN '已确定' WHEN a.ORDER_STATUS = '02' THEN '待维修' WHEN a.ORDER_STATUS = '03' THEN '已维修' WHEN a.ORDER_STATUS = '04' THEN '已完成' END AS status, a.ORDER_STATUS AS orderStatus FROM g_sys_order a LEFT JOIN g_sys_select b ON a.FAULT_TYPE = b.SELECT_ID WHERE a.OPEN_ID = #{openId} ORDER BY a.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT b.SELECT_VALUE, c.PHONE TEL, c.WORKER_NAME, f.COMPANY_NAME, a.*, CASE WHEN a.ORDER_STATUS = '01' THEN '已确定' WHEN a.ORDER_STATUS = '02' THEN '待维修' WHEN a.ORDER_STATUS = '03' THEN '已维修' WHEN a.ORDER_STATUS = '04' THEN '已完成' END AS STATUS FROM g_sys_order a LEFT JOIN g_sys_select b ON a.FAULT_TYPE = b.SELECT_ID LEFT JOIN g_sys_worker c ON a.CONSUMER_ID = c.WORKER_ID LEFT JOIN g_sys_owner d ON a.COMPANY_ID = d.OWNER_ID LEFT JOIN g_sys_manager e ON e.MANAGER_ID = d.MANAGER_ID LEFT JOIN g_sys_company f ON f.COMPANY_ID = e.COMPANY_ID

SELECT a.ORDER_ID AS id, b.SELECT_VALUE AS type, a.CREATE_TIME AS time, CASE WHEN a.ORDER_STATUS = '01' THEN '已确定' WHEN a.ORDER_STATUS = '02' THEN '待维修' WHEN a.ORDER_STATUS = '03' THEN '已维修' WHEN a.ORDER_STATUS = '04' THEN '已完成' END AS status, a.ORDER_STATUS AS orderStatus, c.WORKER_NAME AS woker FROM g_sys_order a LEFT JOIN g_sys_select b ON a.FAULT_TYPE = b.SELECT_ID LEFT JOIN g_sys_worker c ON a.CONSUMER_ID = c.WORKER_ID WHERE a.COMPANY_ID IN ( SELECT OWNER_ID FROM g_sys_owner WHERE MANAGER_ID = #{managerId} ) ORDER BY a.CREATE_TIME DESC;

SELECT a.ORDER_ID AS id, b.SELECT_VALUE AS type, a.CREATE_TIME AS time, CASE WHEN a.ORDER_STATUS = '01' THEN '已确定' WHEN a.ORDER_STATUS = '02' THEN '待维修' WHEN a.ORDER_STATUS = '03' THEN '已维修' WHEN a.ORDER_STATUS = '04' THEN '已完成' END AS status, a.ORDER_STATUS AS orderStatus, c.GRADE AS grade FROM g_sys_order a LEFT JOIN g_sys_select b ON a.FAULT_TYPE = b.SELECT_ID LEFT JOIN g_sys_worker c ON a.CONSUMER_ID = c.WORKER_ID WHERE a.CONSUMER_ID = #{workerId} ORDER BY a.CREATE_TIME DESC;

SELECT a.ORDER_ID AS orderId, b.SELECT_VALUE AS type, a.FEEDBACKSRC AS photos, a.TELEPHONE AS phone, CONCAT(a.ADDRESS,a.CONTACT_ADDR) AS address, c.OWNER_NAME AS unit, a.PROBLEM AS evaluation, a.TRANSFER_DESC AS transferDesc FROM g_sys_order a LEFT JOIN g_sys_select b ON a.FAULT_TYPE = b.SELECT_ID LEFT JOIN g_sys_owner c ON a.COMPANY_ID = c.OWNER_ID WHERE a.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
